video.title: Monster Allergy
video.synopsis: Allergy-prone Zick has the ability to see invisible monsters living among us, a handy talent to have when the creatures misbehave and need to be tamed.

episodes.synopsis: Accompanied by new girl in town Elena, Zick investigates the case of Oldmill's disappearing dogs and meets his first ghost ... and his first monster.
episodes.title: House of Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Timothy unleashes a monster pod to test Zick that starts eating Oldmill. Later, Zick discovers a floating, invisible city of monsters.
episodes.title: Monster Pod Under Oldmill

episodes.synopsis: While looking for Purrcy, Zick and Elena meet an evil Gorka named Magnacat who is kidnapping cats in the name of his fictitious company, Pyramid Inc.
episodes.title: Cat in the Pot

episodes.synopsis: Having met Zick's father before, Magnacat is aware of the boy's Monster Tamer powers and tries to recruit him to his side with an orchestrated test.
episodes.title: The Monster Next Door

episodes.synopsis: With Magnacat turning the citizens of Oldmill into Androgorkas, Timothy seeks help from the famed Gorka hunter Trengingigan, who is not what he seems.
episodes.title: The Pyramid of the Invulnerable

episodes.synopsis: Zick rejects another partnership overture from Magnacat by summoning a Black Phantom: the pirate Bristlebeard, who quickly gets out of control.
episodes.title: Magnacat

episodes.synopsis: Zick and Elena search for rare orchid seeds to help Zick's mother repay the mortgage on her flower shop, but they must defeat Bristlebeard to find them.
episodes.title: Pirate's Hideout

episodes.synopsis: On a field trip to the aquarium, Zick must use his new powers to defeat Black Phantoms that are drawn to an escaped show-off monster.
episodes.title: Terror in the Deep

episodes.synopsis: A friendly rivalry begins between Zick and Teddy Thaur, an older Tamer who has met Zick's father, when they go hunting for monsters and trap a Fouler.
episodes.title: Canned Monsters

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, Omniquod and Omnised use their powers to persuade Zick to surrender to Magnacat, or else they'll assume his form and attack Oldmill.
episodes.title: Zick vs Zick

episodes.synopsis: Magnacat returns and swears vengeance on Zick, who searches the Ancient Armory of the Tamers to find a cure for Elena's cousin, Lonzo.
episodes.title: The Ancient Armory

episodes.synopsis: While searching for a remedy to heal his father, Zick meets the Anguanes, the witches of Oldmill Village, and discovers that one of them is his aunt.
episodes.title: Witches Village

episodes.synopsis: Magnacat sends a menacing Big Bonz Eater to attack Zick, Elena and Teddy, who are searching for a dragon in Drink Water Park.
episodes.title: Mugalak!

episodes.synopsis: The Zicks and Thaurs unite to return Chumba Bagingi to the Port Reef lighthouse, but Elena discovers that the Tamers are heading into a trap.
episodes.title: Family Reunion

episodes.synopsis: A creature spreads terror throughout Oldmill, but it isn't a monster ... it's Elena's pet rabbit, Puffy, transformed into a were-rabbit by Magnacat.
episodes.title: Claws

episodes.synopsis: When the Zicks reject Emily's proposal, she orders her witches to attack their house, but they have the wrong address and assail Elena's pajama party.
episodes.title: Bewitched Party

episodes.synopsis: A warning from the Digesting Plant sends Zob and Terrence Thaur to Magnacat's lair. But when they disappear, Zick and his friends must rescue them.
episodes.title: The Return of Magnacat

episodes.synopsis: The Maximum Tutors announce an inspection of the Barrymore house just as a new monster arrives that's particularly invasive and destructive.
episodes.title: The General Inspector

episodes.synopsis: To facilitate an attack on the Suspended City, Magnacat buys up all the skyscrapers in Bigburg. Can Zick and Elena stop the final property's sale?
episodes.title: The Haunted Skyscraper

episodes.synopsis: When Bombo steals Zick's tele-skates, he's transported to an old house haunted by ravenous ghosts that Zick must defeat to save his friend.
episodes.title: Shoes for Bombo

episodes.synopsis: Zob starts a new job at the Natural History Museum, where the theft of dinosaur bones leads Zick and Elena to uncover another of Magnacat's plots.
episodes.title: The Skeleton Army

episodes.synopsis: When the Maximum Tutors won't listen to his concerns about Magnacat, Zick goes in search of a secret door that will lead to the true Ancient Armory.
episodes.title: The Secret Door

episodes.synopsis: An alliance between Dark Phantoms and Magnacat lures the Tamer families into a trap while launching an invasion of the Suspended City.
episodes.title: The Devourer

episodes.synopsis: Zob and Terrence decide to unite all of the exiled Tamers, both young and old, to form a team that can defeat Magnacat once and for all.
episodes.title: The Last Tamer

episodes.synopsis: Stripped of his powers, Zick decides to help in the final battle by sneaking into the Vulture, Magnacat's assault blimp, and seizing control of it.
episodes.title: The Great Escape

episodes.synopsis: All of Bigburg may fall when Magnacat summons Monstrosaurus, a creature that can flatten an entire city, just as Zick discovers a hidden power.
episodes.title: The Horn of Kong

episodes.synopsis: The Ancient Armory once again opens its doors as the home of all Tamers, but Moog Magister, Lord of the Witches, arrives to seize its monsters.
episodes.title: Lord of the Witches

episodes.synopsis: When two monsters escape from the Armory, one is pursued by his friends, while Zick, Elena, and Bombo hunt the other, a fugitive in monster disguise.
episodes.title: A Monster for Two

episodes.synopsis: Campers are disappearing in Drinkwater Park, and Zick thinks he knows what's responsible: a Mugalak dragon that lives underneath the forest.
episodes.title: The Dragon's Awakening

episodes.synopsis: Struggling to maintain school work and Armory classes, Zick loses his Universal Dombox and has two hours to find it before it releases a Chameleon.
episodes.title: Trust Me!

episodes.synopsis: Elena has a difficult time caring for baby monster Bombolo, but when he is taken away by a gingi named Karmilla, Elena misses him terribly.
episodes.title: A Kingdom for Bombolo

episodes.synopsis: When a part of the Barrymore house collapses, ancient Domboxes concealed in a cavern below are damaged and release the evil monsters trapped within.
episodes.title: The Fall of Barrymore House

episodes.synopsis: Moog Magister turns Zick into a monster with one of his potions, leaving the transformed lad pursued by the other Tamers, including his own father.
episodes.title: Moog's Revenge

episodes.synopsis: When the ghost ship Unicorn attacks the Bigburg coast, Zick calls the spirit of Bristlebeard back to duty in order to stop his former crew.
episodes.title: Pirates of the Unicorn

episodes.synopsis: When he miscalculates a teleport during a blizzard, Zick ends up inside a snowman and can only be rescued by Uzka, who has been caught by Sinistro.
episodes.title: The Snowman

episodes.synopsis: Two new convicts manage to escape from the Barrymore detention oasis to an island, where Zick, Elena and Bombo find a secret lair of escaped monsters.
episodes.title: The Island Rebels

episodes.synopsis: Elena commits a grave error when she allows Bombolo to have a bedtime snack, which causes him to make many more little, voraciously hungry Bombolos.
episodes.title: Milk and Biscuits

episodes.synopsis: Zick, Elena and Bombo discover that the dark Tamer Hector Sinistro is capturing monsters and enslaving them in a circus to entertain humans.
episodes.title: Sinistro's Circus

episodes.synopsis: During a tournament for Tamers in the Armory, all the passageways are sealed and the monsters are freed from their Dromboxes in the crypt.
episodes.title: The Tamers' Tournament

episodes.synopsis: Magnacat has freed himself from his Dombox prison and for his ultimate revenge, he plans to destroy Zick.
episodes.title: The Invisible Enemy

episodes.synopsis: As Bigburg prepares to celebrate its tercentennial with a magnificent light show, the power is suddenly cut by a parasite that feeds on energy.
episodes.title: Blackout

episodes.synopsis: Bombo disappears but Zick soon discovers that he has become a masked wrestling champ who doesn't appear to remember his true identity.
episodes.title: The Great Champion

episodes.synopsis: An archaeologist arrives in Bigburg to announce he has discovered the mythical Pandora's box, but tutor Jeremy recognizes it as an ancient Dombox.
episodes.title: Pandora's Box

episodes.synopsis: Aunt Emily shows up with a fear potion she plans to unleash on Halloween, filling Oldmill with terror, but Bombo's stuffy nose might save the day.
episodes.title: The Potion of Fear

episodes.synopsis: Zick is one of the few who notices that everyone's shadows have changed and uncovers a conspiracy by Sinistro to seize control of a shadow army.
episodes.title: The Rebellion of the Shadows

episodes.synopsis: Bombo has become so fat that the walkways of the city can't support his weight, so his friends take him to the forest for a regimen of weight loss.
episodes.title: The Ghosts of the Forest

episodes.synopsis: For the first time ever, Miss Swift is late, but soon the TV news reveals why: The underground train she was riding has mysteriously disappeared.
episodes.title: The Bottomless Pit

episodes.synopsis: Chumba Bagingi escapes from his Dombox with the help of Chumbamba in order to infiltrate Zick and Elena's production of "The Phantom of the Opera."
episodes.title: Show Must Go On

episodes.synopsis: Hearing that a vampire is roaming Oldmill, Zick and Elena capture him and discover that he is their principal's brother, Bowleg, who wants to be cured.
episodes.title: Brother Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Zick falls asleep on the bus ride home after school and awakens fifteen years later in a future Oldmill that has been conquered by gorkas.
episodes.title: Back Home

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy challenges Zick, Teddy, and Bobby to enter an old swamp house that's full of dark phantoms and capture a polypolipo, but his plan backfires.
episodes.title: The House in the Swamp

episodes.synopsis: The Tamers throw an end-of-school-year party in the Armory, but the festivities are short-lived when the Hundred and First Door is opened.
episodes.title: The Hundred and First Door
